law.catch_line: Criminal conspiracy to commit offense in KRS Chapter 218A -- Penalties.
law.text: Any person who commits a criminal conspiracy as defined in KRS 506.040 to commit any offense in this chapter shall be subject to the same penalties as provided for the underlying offense as specified in this chapter.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 3, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 441, sec. 22, effective July 14, 1992.
